means: 发假誓，作伪证( perjure的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: The witness perjured herself by lying about what she did on the night o the crime.
sentence.Network_cn: 证人对事发当晚所做的事情作了伪证.

PerfectNetExp.abs: perjure 作伪证perjured 伪证的perjurer 伪誓者

list.abs: The witness perjured himself ., 证人作假证.
Swiss almost unanimously feel that your friend has no right to expect you to perjure yourself and that you should in no circumstances consider doing so .瑞士人几乎一致认为，你的朋友无权指望你为他作伪证，而你在任何情况下都不该考虑这么做。
performance of debt 债务清偿perjured witness 作伪证者；作假证的证人perjury 伪证(罪)；伪誓；发假誓
The man scrupled to perjure himself ., 这个人对做伪证犹豫了.

entry.def: In a court of law, perjured evidence or perjured testimony is a false statement of events.

example.ex: ...information that was based on perjured testimony.

auth_sentence.content: She was not present...so...she is perjured because she has said on oath that she witnessed this scene.
auth_sentence.res_content: She was not present...so...she is perjured because she has said on oath that she witnessed this scene.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She was not present...so...she is perjured because she has said on oath that she witnessed this scene.
